SPECIAL


card namegutseffect
Recharge2pow twice as strong for next turn. ends if damaged.


DEFENSES


card namegutsblk/dgeeffect
Defense2blktakes away 5 damage from pow attacks
Protect1blktakes the damage from another target monster and puts it on golem instead
